name: BusElectronicsMain
description: Front/Backend for Controlling the electronics on my Skoolie

scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-backend: cd backend/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-all: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend
scripts.bin-win: cd backend && npm run build-bin-win && cd ../
scripts.bin-linux: cd backend && npm run build-bin-linux && cd ../
scripts.build-binary-win: npm run build-all && npm run move-built-frontend && npm run bin-win
scripts.build-binary-linux: npm run build-all && npm run move-built-frontend && npm run bin-linux
scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i && cd ../
scripts.prep-arm-build: npm run install-frontend && npm run build-frontend && npm run move-built-frontend

author: Soren Zaiser
